scripts.native:build: cd packages/native && pnpm install && pnpm build
scripts.native:pack: cd packages/native && pnpm install && pnpm build && node prepare-package.js && cd dist && npm pack && mv *.tgz ..
scripts.native:install: cd nativeTestApp && npm uninstall @a-little-world/little-world-design-system-native && npm install ../packages/native/a-little-world-little-world-design-system-native-1.0.0.tgz
scripts.native:start: pnpm native:pack && pnpm native:install && cd nativeTestApp && npx expo start -c
scripts.native:ios: pnpm native:pack && pnpm native:install && cd nativeTestApp && npx expo run:ios
scripts.native:android: pnpm native:pack && pnpm native:install && cd nativeTestApp && npx expo run:android
scripts.native:web: pnpm native:pack && pnpm native:install && cd nativeTestApp && npx expo start --web
scripts.storybook:native: pnpm native:pack && pnpm native:install && cd nativeTestApp && npm run storybook
scripts.storybook:native:ios: pnpm native:pack && pnpm native:install && cd nativeTestApp && npm run storybook:ios
scripts.storybook:native:android: pnpm native:pack && pnpm native:install && cd nativeTestApp && npm run storybook:android
